responsibilities: Lead development of LLM for Agentic AI as part of the Generative AI team.
Enable a global network of Professional Services partners on NVIDIA’s full-stack accelerated computing platforms.
Contribute to the development of AI applications and solve real-world problems for enterprise customers using the latest Generative AI models and research.
Act as a lead AI developer and trusted technical expert on the latest Generative AI frameworks and LLM family of products.
Work closely with partners and customers to build scalable industry-specific enterprise AI solutions, including project scoping to POC to production.
Build agentic LLM applications and explore advancements in model training, fine-tuning, and customization.
Enable NVIDIA strategic service delivery partners to build enterprise AI solutions using the accelerated computing stack.
Collaborate with developers and onboard them to NVIDIA AI platforms and services by providing deep technical guidance.
Anticipate customer and partner needs and find enablement opportunities to expand adoption and utilization of NVIDIA Generative AI products and platforms.
Establish and build repeatable reference architecture, communicate standard processes, and understand solution trade-offs.
Share findings and feedback to improve products and services.

Contribute to the development of AI applications and solve real-world problems for enterprise customers using the latest Generative AI models and research.
Act as a lead AI developer and trusted technical expert on the latest Generative AI frameworks and LLM family of products.
Work closely with partners and customers to build scalable industry-specific enterprise AI solutions, including project scoping to POC to production.
Build agentic LLM applications and explore advancements in model training, fine-tuning, and customization.
Enable NVIDIA strategic service delivery partners to build enterprise AI solutions using the accelerated computing stack.
Collaborate with developers and onboard them to NVIDIA AI platforms and services by providing deep technical guidance.
Anticipate customer and partner needs and find enablement opportunities to expand adoption and utilization of NVIDIA Generative AI products and platforms.
Establish and build repeatable reference architecture, communicate standard processes, and understand solution trade-offs.
Share findings and feedback to improve products and services.
